title: Princess Margaret: this is your life
brief_description: The life story of Princess Margaret up to her engagement in 1960. Uses newsreel footage of her childhood and of great occasions at which she was present; her enjoyment of social life; her decision to marry Group-Captain Townsend; the round of Royal engagements; her tours of the West Indies, East Africa and Mauritius; the first photograph of Her Royal Highness with her fiance.
